bibl.title: A construção da Alexandria ptolomaica na historiografia contemporânea. Avec résumés en portugais et en anglais: The Construction of Ptolemaic Alexandria in Contemporary Historiography.
bibl.note: Discusses current academic debates about Alexandria, such as its foundation by Alexander or the way the city was defined and understood in historiography. - Avec résumés en portugais et en anglais.

bibl.title: Mare Nostrum. Estudos sobre o Mediterrâneo Antigo

bibl.seg: Joana Campos Clímaco, A construção da Alexandria ptolomaica na historiografia contemporânea. [The Construction of Ptolemaic Alexandria in Contemporary Historiography.]
Mare Nostrum. Estudos sobre o Mediterrâneo Antigo 1 (2010) pp. 26-36.
Discusses current academic debates about Alexandria, such as its foundation by Alexander or the way the city was defined and understood in historiography. - Avec résumés en portugais et en anglais.
